# Introduction

@StataCorp2023 provides the following example of a classification table to compare the actual values in a data set with the predicted values in a data set. 

$$\begin{array}{c|cc}
& \rlap{\text{True}} \\
\text{Classified} & D & \neg D \\
\hline
+ & P(+, D) & P(+, \neg D) \\
\hline
- & P(-, D) & P(-, \neg D) \\
\end{array}$$
